price: وە ئەو (خوا) زاتێکە دروستی کردووە بۆ ئێوە گوێ و چاوو دڵ سوپاسی ئەو ناکەن زۆر کەم نەبێت
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī ansha-a lakumu al-samʿa wal-abṣāra wal-afidata qalīlan mā tashkurūna
